message.content:
{"id": "13725", "title": "Revert operation is slower than close and reopen in java editor", "description": "The revert operation in the java editor is significantly slower than the close and reopen operations.", "OB": "The revert operation should not take longer than closing and reopening the file.", "EB": "However, it seems that the revert operation is taking more time compared to the close and reopen operations.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open an editor on the file org.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java from the source folder 'Eclipse SWT Custom Widgets' in the project 'org.eclipse.swt' in the open-source repository. 
2) Select the end of the first line and add a space character to mark the file as dirty. 

On my machine, it takes about 8 seconds to perform the following steps: 
1) Click on the close box in the editor tab. 
2) Choose 'No' when prompted to save changes. 
3) Double-click on the file in the navigator to reopen it. 

However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2) and then select 'Revert' from the popup menu in the editor, it takes 15 seconds to replace the contents of the window with the original."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '13725', 'title': 'Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor.', 'description': 'Bug 13725Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'This seems odd, since reverting the file contents ought notto be more than closing and reopening the file. ', 'SR': '1) Start by opening an editor on the fileorg.eclipse.swt.custom.StyledText.java from the source folder "Eclipse SWTCustom Widgets" in the project "org.eclipse.swt" in the open source repository.2) Now, select the end of the first line, and hit a space character so thatthe file has been marked dirty.From this point, on my (fast) machine at home, it takes about 8 seconds toperform the following steps: click on the close box in the editor tab. answer "no" to the "do you want to save changes" dialog double click on the file in the navigator to reopen it.However, if I repeat steps 1) and 2), and then select "Revert" from the pop upmenu in the editor it takes15 seconds to replace the contents of the windowwith the original. '}
